body:
I am here to ask the same question as these two perverted gentlemen below me.
Seeing dozens of dojins featuring shining finger while rumiho cat girl has pretty much none makes me dissappointed.
to this day this is still the only doujin with faris as the main character, smh
Why there are so few Faris doujins when she is so attractive and her character fits the doujin "archetype" so well, I will never know.
